meanings: (빛깔이) be[get] dyed, be[get] colored, be tinged (with)
(사상·풍조 등에) be influenced[affected] (by), be tinged (with), (formal) be imbued (with); (나쁜 사상 등에) be tainted (with)

vlive.korean: '물들어' 아 '물들어' 노래 어떻게 했지? "COLORED". How did you know that song? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 봄에는 봄날애💕
vlive.english: "COLORED". How did you know that song?

vlive.korean: 그거 보라색으로 물들어가지고 저 양말 보라색으로... That was dyed in purple. And my socks turned purple, too. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈이와 태현이 질문 받았다 요!
vlive.english: That was dyed in purple. And my socks turned purple, too.

vlive.korean: 이거 '물들어' 인가? Is this "COLORED"? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 연 날리기😆
'물들어' 한 소절 불러달라고? Sing a verse of "Coloring"? 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 나랑 놀 사람🐣
사랑 보랗게 물들어~ 로하처럼~ "Love gets colored purple~ Like AROHA~" 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 'All Night(전화해)' 우리 컴백했어요

examples.korean: The juice from the berries stained their fingers red. 발음듣기 나무 열매에서 나온 즙 때문에 그들의 손이 빨갛게 물들어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The juice from the berries stained their fingers red. 발음

examples.korean: Don’t come back with any fancy ideas. 발음듣기 돌아올 때 생각이 고급에 물들어 오지 않도록 해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t come back with any fancy ideas. 발음

examples.korean: The man had his hands bathed in blood. 발음듣기 사내의 손은 온통 피로 물들어 있었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The man had his hands bathed in blood. 발음

examples.korean: be steeped in crime 발음듣기 죄악에 깊이 빠져[물들어] 있다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
The leaves had all the shades of colors from vivid green to reddish brown. 발음듣기 나뭇잎들은 산뜻한 녹색부터 불그스름한 갈색에 이르기까지 온갖 색조(色調)로 물들어 있었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The leaves had all the shades of colors from vivid green to reddish brown. 발음
